Negotiation & Influencing

{!Job__c.Account_Name__c} ENSI Reinforcement Email #1
Greetings {!Contact.FirstName}
First thank you for all your energy and input into our recent ENSI Negotiation & Influencing program. And for your good humour too.
Here are 3 electronic templates for your use
Systematic Negotiation Preparation Negotiation Process Observation Post-Negotiation Review
Please check them out and follow us on LinkedIn for the latest ENSI articles and insights.
Towards greater negotiation success...
{!Job__c.Facilitator_names__c} www.negotiate.org
